name: Ninpo
description:
A Game By: Ernesto Torres

Made For Epic Mega Jam 2022

Theme: As Above, So Below

Put your Ninja Typing skills to test!

Fight Demons and Gods.

Doesn't matter if they are from the heaven above or the hell below.

Can you defeat everyone in your way and exit as a champion?

INSTRUCTIONS:

Type the words as they appear in the screen.
